Package logic

The logic package contains the relevant items for running an actual game of Jungle.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstantValues
    This class contains constants to be used throughout the program Jungle.
    Coordinate
    This class represents a coordinate within a board.
    Game
    This class models a game itself.
    GameBoard
    This class models a game board.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidMoveException
    This class is meant to act as a custom exception for code validating move validity.
    SameSideException
    This class is meant to act as a custom exception for code validating move validity.

Package logic Description

The logic package contains the relevant items for running an actual game of Jungle.

This package contains the constant values required for board and game analysis, as well as the board, exceptions, and coordinate classes needed.
